product_name: Mountain House Chicken A La King with Noodles - 2 Servings
long_description: Dine in style--this entree features freeze-dried chicken, mushrooms and noodles in a rich white sauce. Stand-up pouch creates an easy way to cook and eat your meal; made from high-barrier foil, the pouch keeps your meal hot. Just mix contents with boiling water in the pouch provided; let stand for a few minutes and serve. Ready in an instant for easy camp meals. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Dine in style--this entree features freeze-dried chicken, mushrooms and noodles in a rich white sauce.
